content.prompt: Words such as “fallible” and “fragmentary” in the final paragraph imply which of the following about the author?

choices.label: He suffers from an increasing sense of alienation.
He interprets the history of India as tragic in nature.
He cannot represent the past with complete accuracy.
He is committed to the idea of objective truth.

skill.text: Skill 7.A: Explain how word choice, comparisons, and syntax contribute to the specific tone or style of a text.
